name: Formstack Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow on a Formstack form submission.
natural_language_description: 这是 Formstack Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow on a Formstack form submission.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

formId.name: formId
formId.description: The Formstack form to monitor for new submissions. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
formId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Name or ID | 作用: The Formstack form to monitor for new submissions. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True
